import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create Asset Type"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/types/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Registers a new asset type to categorize devices and control available fields. Asset types define inventory categorization such as Devices, Peripherals, or Network Equipment.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetInventoryTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets/inventory/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-inventory-types) if available, or reference existing asset types from [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-types).

**Workflow Example**
1. Review existing types: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-types) to check for duplicates.
2. Build request with Name, Scope (Global/Site), and field configuration.
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/assets/types/new](/docs/api/assets/create-asset-type) to register the new category.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Name, AssetInventoryTypeId

**Field Configuration**: Set `IsModelFieldSupported: true` to enable model selection, `IsAssetNameFieldSupported: true` for custom naming.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating an asset type. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.UpdateAssetTypeRequest`.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Full asset type definition returned by GET /api/v1.0/assets/types endpoints. Asset types categorize devices (Chromebook, iPad, Desktop, etc.) and control which fields and behaviors are available.","properties":{"AssetTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the asset type"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site identifier when the asset type is scoped to a single location. Null indicates a global or product-level type."},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Scope that determines where the asset type is visible","enum":["Global","Site","Product"]},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the asset type shown in pickers and reports"},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Font Awesome icon class for the asset type (e.g., 'fa-laptop', 'fa-tablet')","nullable":true},"DefaultColumns":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Default column identifiers displayed in asset grid views for this type","nullable":true},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Display order when presenting asset types in lists","example":10},"Assets":{"type":"integer","description":"Count of assets currently assigned to this type"},"EsoIsVisible":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the asset type is visible in external self-service ordering portals"},"AssetInventoryTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the inventory type classification (e.g., Tracked, Consumable)"},"DefaultLoanPeriodWorkdays":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Default loan period in working days for assets of this type"},"LoanPeriodDueDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Fixed due date for loans of this asset type, when applicable"},"IsModelFieldSupported":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether assets of this type support the Model field"},"IsAssetNameFieldSupported":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether assets of this type support a custom Name field"},"CategoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to the parent category for this asset type"},"ImageId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to the default image file for this asset type"},"ResourceGroupIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true,"description":"Resource groups associated with this asset type"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product identifier when scoped to a specific product module"},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the asset type was created"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the asset type was last modified"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the asset type has been soft-deleted"}},"required":["AssetTypeId","Scope","Name","SortOrder","EsoIsVisible","AssetInventoryTypeId","IsModelFieldSupported","IsAssetNameFieldSupported","IsDeleted"],"title":"AssetType"},{"type":"object","properties":{"IsDuplicateRequest":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, indicates this request is intentionally duplicating an existing type.","default":false}}}],"title":"UpdateAssetTypeRequest"},"example":{"AssetTypeId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000","Name":"Chromebook","Scope":"Global","AssetInventoryTypeId":"83a10b14-c3a9-4f3b-b104-da83276f9101","IsModelFieldSupported":true,"IsAssetNameFieldSupported":false,"SortOrder":1,"EsoIsVisible":true,"IsDeleted":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
